channel.title: Get vbPortal for free?
channel.description:
if u havent heard of vbPortal, its an addon for vBulliten which allows you to create an entire site portal out of your forums, its site is http://www.phpportals.com i have already found a download for vBulliten but all of the sites ive found that have vbPortal ask you to sign up and pay for membership to download.
if anyone knows a download link for vbPortal it would be grealty appreciated.
